clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in perihilar region.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in perihilar region.
Collapse of perihilar region lobe with volume loss.

Bronchiectatic changes in perihilar region region.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in perihilar region.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
